name: Oh dear, that's a lot of deer!
name_original: Oh dear, that's a lot of deer!
description:
Be the greatest grandchild alive and make your grandma's dreams come true. She dreams of a ranch of deer - so give it to her! Run around and throw all deers into your ma's pen. While you're at it, don't forget to feed and water your newly acquired friends ;)

Controls

WSAD or Arrows to move
1 to Water
2 to Feed
SPACE to Grab/ Drop deer
SHIFT to Run

Credits

Background music - Happy Arcade Tune by rezoner from OpenGameArt.org
Tileset - Zelda-like tilesets and sprites by ArMM1998 from OpenGameArt.org
Sound effects created using sfxr
